00031 int main(void)
00032 {
00033         long    flags;
00034         t_class *c;
00035 
00036         jamoma_init();
00037 
00038         c = class_new("jcom.ui",
00039                                   (method)ui_new,
00040                                   (method)ui_free,
00041                                   sizeof(t_ui),
00042                                   (method)NULL,
00043                                   A_GIMME,
00044                                   0L);
00045 
00046         flags = JBOX_TEXTFIELD | JBOX_COLOR;
00047         jbox_initclass(c, flags);
00048         c->c_flags |= CLASS_FLAG_NEWDICTIONARY; // to specify dictionary constructor
00049 
00050         class_addmethod(c, (method)ui_notify,                   "notify",                       A_CANT, 0);
00051         class_addmethod(c, (method)ui_paint,                    "paint",                        A_CANT, 0);
00052         class_addmethod(c, (method)ui_mousedown,                "mousedown",            A_CANT, 0);
00053         class_addmethod(c, (method)ui_mousedragdelta,   "mousedragdelta",       A_CANT, 0);
00054         class_addmethod(c, (method)ui_mouseup,                  "mouseup",                      A_CANT, 0);
00055         class_addmethod(c, (method)ui_oksize,                   "oksize",               A_CANT, 0);
00056 
00057         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,   "patching_rect",        0, "0. 0. 300. 70.");
00058         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,   "fontname",                     0, JAMOMA_DEFAULT_FONT);
00059         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,   "fontsize",                     0, "10");
00060         
00061         CLASS_ATTR_LONG(c,              "has_inspector",        0, t_ui, attr_hasinspector);
00062         CLASS_ATTR_STYLE(c,             "has_inspector",        0, "onoff");
00063         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,   "has_inspector",        0, "0");
00064         CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c,              "has_inspector",        0);
00065 
00066         CLASS_ATTR_LONG(c,              "has_meters",           0, t_ui, attr_hasmeters);
00067         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,   "has_meters",           0, "0");        // number of meters to display
00068         CLASS_ATTR_SAVE(c,              "has_meters",           0);
00069 
00070         CLASS_ATTR_LONG(c,              "meters_defeated",      0, t_ui, attr_metersdefeated);
00071         CLASS_ATTR_STYLE(c,             "meters_defeated",      0, "onoff");
00072         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,   "meters_defeated",      0, "0");        // number of meters to display
00073 
00074         CLASS_ATTR_LONG(c,              "has_mute",                     0, t_ui, attr_hasmute);
00075         CLASS_ATTR_STYLE(c,             "has_mute",                     0, "onoff");
00076         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,   "has_mute",                     0, "0");

00137 
00138         CLASS_ATTR_SYM(c,               "module_name",          0, t_ui, attr_modulename);
00139         CLASS_ATTR_DEFAULT(c,   "module_name",          0, "/Jamoma");
00140 
00141         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00142         s_ui_class = c;
00143         return 0;
00144 }
00145 
00146 
00147 t_ui* ui_new(t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00148 {
00149         t_ui                    *x = NULL;
00150         t_dictionary    *d = NULL;
00151 //      t_object                *textfield = NULL; 
00152         long                    flags;
00153         t_atom                  a[1];
00154 
00155         if(!(d=object_dictionaryarg(argc, argv)))
00156                 return NULL;    
00157 
00158         if(x = (t_ui*)object_alloc(s_ui_class)){
00159                 flags = 0 
00160                                 | JBOX_DRAWFIRSTIN
00161                                 | JBOX_NODRAWBOX
00162                 //              | JBOX_DRAWINLAST
00163                                 | JBOX_TRANSPARENT      
00164                 //              | JBOX_NOGROW
00165                 //              | JBOX_GROWY
00166                                 | JBOX_GROWBOTH
00167                 //              | JBOX_IGNORELOCKCLICK
00168                                 | JBOX_HILITE
00169                                 | JBOX_BACKGROUND
00170                 //              | JBOX_NOFLOATINSPECTOR
00171                                 | JBOX_TEXTFIELD
00172                                 ;
00173 
00174                 jbox_new(&x->box, flags, argc, argv);
00175                 x->box.b_firstin = (t_object *)x;
00176                 x->outlet = outlet_new(x, 0L);
00177                 x->menu_items = NULL;
00178                 x->refmenu_items = NULL;
00179                 x->presets = linklist_new();
00180                 x->hash_internals = hashtab_new(0);
00181                 
00182                 atom_setsym(a, ps__gui__);
00183                 jcom_core_loadextern(gensym("jcom.remote"), 1, a, &x->obj_remote);
00184                 
00185 /*              
00186                 textfield = jbox_get_textfield((t_object*) x); 
00187                 textfield_set_noactivate(textfield, 1);
00188                 textfield_set_readonly(textfield, 1);
00189                 textfield_set_editonclick(textfield, 0);
00190                 textfield_set_wordwrap(textfield, 0);
00191                 textfield_set_useellipsis(textfield, 1); 
00192                 textfield_set_textcolor(textfield, &s_light_gray);
00193                 textfield_set_textmargins(textfield, 20.0, 2.0, 60.0, 51.0);
00194 */
00195                 attr_dictionary_process(x, d);                                  // handle attribute args
00196                 jbox_ready(&x->box);
00197 
00198                 x = (t_ui *)object_register(CLASS_BOX, symbol_unique(), x);
00199                 object_attach_byptr(x, x);                                              // sign up for notifications of changes to our attributes
00200                 
00201                 x->menu_items = (t_linklist *)linklist_new();
00202                 ui_menu_build(x);
00203                 x->menu_qelem = qelem_new(x, (method)ui_menu_qfn);
00204 
00205                 x->refmenu_items = (t_linklist *)linklist_new();
00206                 ui_refmenu_build(x);
00207                 x->refmenu_qelem = qelem_new(x, (method)ui_refmenu_qfn);
00208         }
00209         return x;
00210 }
00211 
00212 
00213 void ui_free(t_ui *x)
00214 {
00215         jbox_free(&x->box);
00216 
00217         qelem_free(x->menu_qelem);
00218         x->menu_qelem = NULL;
00219         object_free(x->menu_items);
00220         
00221         qelem_free(x->refmenu_qelem);
00222         x->refmenu_qelem = NULL;
00223         object_free(x->refmenu_items);
00224         
00225         object_free(x->presets);
00226         object_free(x->obj_remote);
00227         ui_internals_destroy(x);
00228 
00229         object_detach_byptr(x, x); 
00230         object_unregister(x); 
00231 }
00232 
00233 
00234 #pragma mark -
00235 #pragma mark methods
00236 
00237 void ui_notify(t_ui *x, t_symbol *s, t_symbol *msg, void *sender, void *data)
00238 {
00239         t_object        *textfield;
00240         t_symbol        *attrname;
00241 
00242         if((msg == _sym_attr_modified) && (sender == x)){
00243                 attrname = (t_symbol *)object_method((t_object *)data, gensym("getname"));
00244                 
00245                 if(attrname == gensym("module_name")){
00246                         textfield = jbox_get_textfield((t_object*) x); 
00247                         object_method(textfield, gensym("settext"), x->attr_modulename->s_name);
00248                 }
00249                 else
00250                         ui_menu_build(x);               // we don't really want this everytime -- make this conditional...
00251 
00252                 jbox_redraw(&x->box);
00253         }
00254 }

00259         ;
00260 }

00265 
00266 void ui_paint(t_ui *x, t_object *view)
00267 {
00268         t_rect          rect;
00269         t_jgraphics *g;
00270         double          border_thickness = 0.5;
00271         double          cornersize = 12.0;
00272         double          middle;
00273 
00274         g = (t_jgraphics*) patcherview_get_jgraphics(view);
00275         jbox_get_rect_for_view((t_object*) &x->box, view, &rect);
00276 
00277         // clear the background
00278         jgraphics_rectangle_rounded(g,  border_thickness, 
00279                                                                         border_thickness, 
00280                                                                         rect.width - ((border_thickness) * 2.0), 
00281                                                                         rect.height - ((border_thickness) * 2.0), 
00282                                                                         cornersize, cornersize); 
00283         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g,   &s_color_background_audio);
00284         jgraphics_fill(g);
00285         
00286         // draw the titlebar
00287         jgraphics_rectangle_rounded(g,  border_thickness, 
00288                                                                         border_thickness, 
00289                                                                         rect.width - (border_thickness * 2.0 + 1.0), 
00290                                                                         18.0, 
00291                                                                         cornersize, cornersize); 
00292         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g,   &s_color_titlebar_audio);
00293         jgraphics_fill(g);
00294         
00295         jgraphics_rectangle_fill_fast(g, border_thickness, 
00296                                                                         9.0, 
00297                                                                         rect.width - (border_thickness * 2.0 + 1.0), 
00298                                                                         10.0);
00299         
00300         // draw borders
00301         jgraphics_rectangle_rounded(g,  border_thickness, 
00302                                                                         border_thickness, 
00303                                                                         rect.width - (border_thickness * 2.0), 
00304                                                                         rect.height - (border_thickness * 2.0), 
00305                                                                         cornersize, cornersize); 
00306         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g,   &s_color_border_audio);
00307         jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.0);
00308         jgraphics_stroke(g);
00309 
00310         jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.0);
00311         jgraphics_move_to(g, border_thickness, 19.5);
00312         jgraphics_line_to(g, rect.width - (border_thickness * 1.0), 19.5);
00313         jgraphics_stroke(g);
00314         
00315         // draw the menu icon
00316         jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00317         jgraphics_oval(g, 3.0, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00318         jgraphics_fill(g);
00319 
00320         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_border_button);
00321         jgraphics_oval(g, 3.0, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00322         jgraphics_stroke(g);
00323 
00324         middle = 9.0;
00325         jgraphics_move_to(g, 9.5, middle + 4.0);
00326         jgraphics_line_to(g, 13.5, middle);
00327         jgraphics_line_to(g, 5.5, middle);
00328         jgraphics_close_path(g);
00329         jgraphics_fill(g);
00330 
00331 
00332         // draw the gain knob
00333         if(x->attr_hasgain){
00334                 long right_side = rect.width - 16.0;
00335 
00336                 if(x->attr_hasmix)
00337                         right_side -= 16.0;
00338                 if(x->attr_hasmute)
00339                         right_side -= 16.0;
00340                 if(x->attr_hasbypass)
00341                         right_side -= 16.0;
00342                 if(x->attr_hasfreeze)
00343                         right_side -= 16.0;
00344                 if(x->attr_haspreview)
00345                         right_side -= 16.0;
00346                 if(x->attr_hasinspector)
00347                         right_side -= 16.0;
00348         
00349                 //if(x->attr_ismuted)
00350                 //      jgraphics_set_source_rgb(g, 0.6, 0.2, 0.2);
00351                 //else
00352                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_background_button);
00353                 
00354                 x->rect_gain.x = right_side;
00355                 x->rect_gain.width = 13.0;
00356                 
00357                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00358                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00359                 jgraphics_fill(g);
00360 
00361                 jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_border_button);
00362                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00363                 jgraphics_stroke(g);
00364         }
00365         
00366         
00367         // draw the mix knob
00368         if(x->attr_hasmix){
00369                 long right_side = rect.width - 16.0;
00370 
00371                 if(x->attr_hasmute)
00372                         right_side -= 16.0;
00373                 if(x->attr_hasbypass)
00374                         right_side -= 16.0;
00375                 if(x->attr_hasfreeze)
00376                         right_side -= 16.0;
00377                 if(x->attr_haspreview)
00378                         right_side -= 16.0;
00379                 if(x->attr_hasinspector)
00380                         right_side -= 16.0;
00381         
00382                 //if(x->attr_ismuted)
00383                 //      jgraphics_set_source_rgb(g, 0.6, 0.2, 0.2);
00384                 //else
00385                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_background_button);
00386                 
00387                 x->rect_mix.x = right_side;
00388                 x->rect_mix.width = 13.0;
00389                 
00390                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00391                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00392                 jgraphics_fill(g);
00393 
00394                 jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_border_button);
00395                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00396                 jgraphics_stroke(g);
00397                                 
00398         }
00399 
00400 
00401         // draw the mute button
00402         if(x->attr_hasmute){
00403                 long right_side = rect.width - 16.0;
00404 
00405                 if(x->attr_hasbypass)
00406                         right_side -= 16.0;
00407                 if(x->attr_hasfreeze)
00408                         right_side -= 16.0;
00409                 if(x->attr_haspreview)
00410                         right_side -= 16.0;
00411                 if(x->attr_hasinspector)
00412                         right_side -= 16.0;
00413         
00414                 if(x->attr_ismuted)
00415                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_red_button);
00416                 else
00417                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_background_button);
00418                 
00419                 x->rect_mute.x = right_side;
00420                 x->rect_mute.width = 13.0;
00421                 
00422                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00423                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00424                 jgraphics_fill(g);
00425 
00426                 jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_border_button);
00427                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00428                 jgraphics_stroke(g);
00429                                 
00430                 // m
00431                 if(x->attr_ismuted)
00432                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_text_button_on);
00433                 else
00434                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_text_button_off);
00435 
00436                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 2.0);
00437                 jgraphics_move_to(g, right_side + 2.5, 13.0);
00438                 jgraphics_select_font_face(g, JAMOMA_BUTTON_FONT, JGRAPHICS_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD);
00439                 jgraphics_set_font_size(g, 7.0);
00440                 jgraphics_show_text(g, "m");
00441         }
00442 
00443         // draw the bypass button
00444         if(x->attr_hasbypass){
00445                 long right_side = rect.width - 16.0;
00446 
00447                 if(x->attr_hasfreeze)
00448                         right_side -= 16.0;
00449                 if(x->attr_haspreview)
00450                         right_side -= 16.0;
00451                 if(x->attr_hasinspector)
00452                         right_side -= 16.0;
00453         
00454                 if(x->attr_isbypassed)
00455                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_blue_button);
00456                 else
00457                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_background_button);
00458                 
00459                 x->rect_bypass.x = right_side;
00460                 x->rect_bypass.width = 13.0;
00461                 
00462                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00463                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00464                 jgraphics_fill(g);
00465 
00466                 jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_border_button);
00467                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00468                 jgraphics_stroke(g);
00469                                 
00470                 // b
00471                 if(x->attr_isbypassed)
00472                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_text_button_on);
00473                 else
00474                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_text_button_off);
00475                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 2.0);
00476                 jgraphics_move_to(g, right_side + 4.0, 13.0);
00477                 jgraphics_select_font_face(g, JAMOMA_BUTTON_FONT, JGRAPHICS_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD);
00478                 jgraphics_set_font_size(g, 7.0);
00479                 jgraphics_show_text(g, "b");
00480         }
00481 
00482         // draw the freeze button
00483         if(x->attr_hasfreeze){
00484                 long right_side = rect.width - 16.0;
00485 
00486                 if(x->attr_haspreview)
00487                         right_side -= 16.0;
00488                 if(x->attr_hasinspector)
00489                         right_side -= 16.0;
00490         
00491                 if(x->attr_isfrozen)
00492                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_orange_button);
00493                 else
00494                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_background_button);
00495                 
00496                 x->rect_freeze.x = right_side;
00497                 x->rect_freeze.width = 13.0;
00498                 
00499                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00500                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00501                 jgraphics_fill(g);
00502 
00503                 jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_border_button);
00504                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00505                 jgraphics_stroke(g);
00506                                 
00507                 // f
00508                 if(x->attr_isfrozen)
00509                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_text_button_on);
00510                 else
00511                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_text_button_off);
00512                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 2.0);
00513                 jgraphics_move_to(g, right_side + 5.0, 13.0);
00514                 jgraphics_select_font_face(g, JAMOMA_BUTTON_FONT, JGRAPHICS_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD);
00515                 jgraphics_set_font_size(g, 7.0);
00516                 jgraphics_show_text(g, "f");
00517         }
00518 
00519         // draw the preview button
00520         if(x->attr_haspreview){
00521                 long right_side = rect.width - 16.0;
00522 
00523                 if(x->attr_hasinspector)
00524                         right_side -= 16.0;
00525         
00526                 if(x->attr_ispreviewing)
00527                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_green_button);
00528                 else
00529                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_background_button);
00530                 
00531                 x->rect_preview.x = right_side;
00532                 x->rect_preview.width = 13.0;
00533                 
00534                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00535                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00536                 jgraphics_fill(g);
00537 
00538                 jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_border_button);
00539                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00540                 jgraphics_stroke(g);
00541                                 
00542                 // p
00543                 if(x->attr_ispreviewing)
00544                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_text_button_on);
00545                 else
00546                         jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_text_button_off);
00547                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 2.0);
00548                 jgraphics_move_to(g, right_side + 4.0, 12.0);
00549                 jgraphics_select_font_face(g, JAMOMA_BUTTON_FONT, JGRAPHICS_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD);
00550                 jgraphics_set_font_size(g, 7.0);
00551                 jgraphics_show_text(g, "p");
00552         }
00553 
00554         // draw the info button
00555         if(x->attr_hasinspector){
00556                 long right_side = rect.width - 16.0;
00557                 
00558                 x->rect_inspector.x = right_side;
00559                 x->rect_inspector.width = 13.0;
00560 
00561                 jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_background_button);
00562                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 1.5);
00563                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00564                 jgraphics_fill(g);
00565 
00566                 jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_border_button);
00567                 jgraphics_oval(g, right_side, 3.0, 13.0, 13.0);
00568                 jgraphics_stroke(g);
00569                                 
00570                 // i
00571                 jgraphics_set_source_jrgba(g, &s_color_text_button_off);
00572                 jgraphics_set_line_width(g, 2.0);
00573                 jgraphics_move_to(g, right_side + 5.0, 13.0);
00574                 jgraphics_select_font_face(g, JAMOMA_BUTTON_FONT, JGRAPHICS_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD);
00575                 jgraphics_set_font_size(g, 7.0);
00576                 jgraphics_show_text(g, "i");
00577         }
00578 }
00579 
00580 
00581 void ui_mousedown(t_ui *x, t_object *patcherview, t_pt px, long modifiers)
00582 {
00583         t_rect rect;
00584         
00585         jbox_get_rect_for_view((t_object *)x, patcherview, &rect); 
00586         if(px.y > 20.0) // we only handle clicks in the title bar
00587                 return;
00588         
00589         if(px.x > (rect.width - 120)){
00590                 // we check the gain and mix knobs first because they are continuous parameters and should run as fast as possible
00591                 if(x->attr_hasgain && px.x >= x->rect_gain.x && px.x <= (x->rect_gain.x + x->rect_gain.width)){
00592                         post("mousedown for gain");
00593                 }
00594                 else if(x->attr_hasmix && px.x >= x->rect_mix.x && px.x <= (x->rect_mix.x + x->rect_mix.width)){
00595                         post("mousedown for mix");
00596                 }
00597                 else if(x->attr_hasinspector && px.x >= x->rect_inspector.x && px.x <= (x->rect_inspector.x + x->rect_inspector.width))
00598                         ; // TODO: send the /inspector message to the hub
00599                 else if(x->attr_haspreview && px.x >= x->rect_preview.x && px.x <= (x->rect_preview.x + x->rect_preview.width))
00600                         object_attr_setlong(x, gensym("is_previewing"), !x->attr_ispreviewing);
00601                 else if(x->attr_hasfreeze && px.x >= x->rect_freeze.x && px.x <= (x->rect_freeze.x + x->rect_freeze.width))
00602                         object_attr_setlong(x, gensym("is_frozen"), !x->attr_isfrozen);
00603                 else if(x->attr_hasbypass && px.x >= x->rect_bypass.x && px.x <= (x->rect_bypass.x + x->rect_bypass.width))
00604                         object_attr_setlong(x, gensym("is_bypassed"), !x->attr_isbypassed);
00605                 else if(x->attr_hasmute && px.x >= x->rect_mute.x && px.x <= (x->rect_mute.x + x->rect_mute.width))
00606                         object_attr_setlong(x, gensym("is_muted"), !x->attr_ismuted);
00607         }
00608         else if(px.x < 25)
00609                 ui_menu_do(x, patcherview, px, modifiers);
00610         else if(px.x < 150)
00611                 ui_refmenu_do(x, patcherview, px, modifiers);
00612 }

00696 void ui_mouseup(t_ui *x, t_object *patcherview)
00697 {
00698 /*

00712 
00713 #pragma mark -
00714 #pragma mark Menus
00715 
00716 void ui_menu_do(t_ui *x, t_object *patcherview, t_pt px, long modifiers)
00717 {
00718         t_jpopupmenu            *p;
00719         t_symobject                     *item;
00720         long                            size, i;
00721         int                             selectedId;
00722         t_jfont                         *font;
00723         int                                     coord_x=0, coord_y=0;
00724         t_pt                            pt;
00725 
00726         jbox_set_mousedragdelta((t_object *)x, 0);
00727         p = jpopupmenu_create();
00728 
00729         font = jfont_create(JAMOMA_MENU_FONT,
00730                                                 JGRAPHICS_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL,
00731                                                 JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL,
00732                                                 JAMOMA_MENU_FONTSIZE);
00733         jpopupmenu_setfont(p, font);
00734         jfont_destroy(font);
00735         size = linklist_getsize(x->menu_items);
00736         for(i=0; i<size; i++){
00737                 item = (t_symobject *)linklist_getindex(x->menu_items, i);
00738                 if(!item->sym || (item->sym->s_name[0] == '\0') || item->sym->s_name[0] == '-')//{
00739                         jpopupmenu_addseperator(p);
00740                 else{
00741                         if(item->sym == gensym("Defeat Signal Meters")){
00742                                 if(x->attr_metersdefeated)
00743                                         jpopupmenu_additem(p, i+1, item->sym->s_name, NULL, 1, 0, NULL);
00744                                 else
00745                                         jpopupmenu_additem(p, i+1, item->sym->s_name, NULL, 0, item->flags, NULL);
00746                         }
00747                         else
00748                                 jpopupmenu_additem(p, i+1, item->sym->s_name, NULL, 0, item->flags, NULL);
00749                 }
00750         }
00751 
00752         object_method(patcherview, gensym("canvastoscreen"), 0.0, 0.0, &coord_x, &coord_y);     
00753         coord_x += x->box.b_patching_rect.x;
00754         coord_y += x->box.b_patching_rect.y;
00755         pt.x = coord_x;
00756         pt.y = coord_y;
00757         selectedId = jpopupmenu_popup(p, pt, x->refmenu_selection+1);
00758         if(selectedId){
00759                 x->menu_selection = selectedId -1;
00760                 qelem_set(x->menu_qelem);
00761         }       
00762         jpopupmenu_destroy(p);
00763 }
00764 
00765 
00766 void ui_menu_qfn(t_ui *x)
00767 {
00768         t_symobject *item = (t_symobject *)linklist_getindex(x->menu_items, x->menu_selection);
00769         
00770         if(item->sym == gensym("Defeat Signal Meters")){
00771                 if(x->attr_metersdefeated)
00772                         object_attr_setlong(x, gensym("meters_defeated"), 0);
00773                 else
00774                         object_attr_setlong(x, gensym("meters_defeated"), 1);
00775         }
00776 }

00778 
00779 void ui_menu_build(t_ui *x)
00780 {
00781         t_symobject     *item = NULL;
00782         int                     numPresets = 0;
00783         int                     i;
00784         
00785         if(!x->refmenu_items)
00786                 return;
00787 
00788         linklist_clear(x->menu_items);
00789         
00790         if(x->attr_hasmeters){
00791                 item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Defeat Signal Meters"));
00792                 linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00793                 item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Clear Signal Meters"));
00794                 linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00795                 item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("-"));
00796                 linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00797         }
00798         
00799         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Load Settings..."));
00800         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00801         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Save Settings..."));
00802         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00803         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Restore Default Settings"));
00804         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00805         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("-"));
00806         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00807         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Open Reference Page"));
00808         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00809         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("View Internal Components"));
00810         linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00811         
00812         numPresets = linklist_getsize(x->presets);
00813         if(numPresets){
00814                 item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("-"));
00815                 linklist_append(x->menu_items, item);
00816                 
00817                 for(i=0; i<numPresets; i++){
00818                         ; // TODO: add presets to menu here
00819                 }
00820         }
00821 }

00824 void ui_refmenu_do(t_ui *x, t_object *patcherview, t_pt px, long modifiers)
00825 {
00826         t_jpopupmenu            *p;
00827         t_symobject                     *item;
00828         long                            size, i;
00829         int                             selectedId;
00830         t_jfont                         *font;
00831         int                                     coord_x=0, coord_y=0;
00832         t_pt                            pt;
00833 
00834         jbox_set_mousedragdelta((t_object *)x, 0);
00835         p = jpopupmenu_create();
00836 
00837         font = jfont_create(JAMOMA_MENU_FONT,
00838                                                 JGRAPHICS_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL,
00839                                                 JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL,
00840                                                 JAMOMA_MENU_FONTSIZE);
00841         jpopupmenu_setfont(p, font);
00842         jfont_destroy(font);
00843         size = linklist_getsize(x->refmenu_items);
00844         for(i=0; i<size; i++){
00845                 item = (t_symobject *)linklist_getindex(x->refmenu_items, i);
00846                 if(!item->sym || (item->sym->s_name[0] == '\0') || item->sym->s_name[0] == '-')//{
00847                         jpopupmenu_addseperator(p);
00848                 else
00849                         jpopupmenu_additem(p, i+1, item->sym->s_name, NULL, 0, item->flags, NULL);
00850         }
00851 
00852         object_method(patcherview, gensym("canvastoscreen"), 0.0, 0.0, &coord_x, &coord_y);     
00853         coord_x += x->box.b_patching_rect.x;
00854         coord_y += x->box.b_patching_rect.y;
00855         pt.x = coord_x + 20.0;
00856         pt.y = coord_y;
00857 
00858         selectedId = jpopupmenu_popup(p, pt, x->refmenu_selection+1);
00859         if(selectedId){
00860                 x->refmenu_selection = selectedId -1;
00861                 qelem_set(x->refmenu_qelem);
00862         }
00863 
00864         jpopupmenu_destroy(p);
00865 }

00871         item = item;    // silencing a warning
00872         /*
00873                 TODO: When a menu item is selected here, what we should do is open a dialog with
00874                 the message in it.  When the use clicks 'ok' in the dialog then the message
00875                 should be sent to the module.
00876         */
00877 }

00879 
00880 void ui_refmenu_build(t_ui *x)
00881 {
00882         t_symobject     *item = NULL;
00883         
00884         if(!x->refmenu_items)
00885                 return;
00886         
00887         linklist_clear(x->refmenu_items);
00888         
00889         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Module: jmod.?~"));
00890         linklist_append(x->refmenu_items, item);
00891         item->flags = 1;        // mark to disable this item (we use it as a label)
00892 
00893         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("-"));
00894         linklist_append(x->refmenu_items, item);
00895         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Parameters"));
00896         linklist_append(x->refmenu_items, item);
00897         item->flags = 1;        // mark to disable this item (we use it as a label)
00898 
00899         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("/foo"));
00900         linklist_append(x->refmenu_items, item);
00901 
00902 
00903         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("-"));
00904         linklist_append(x->refmenu_items, item);
00905         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Messages"));
00906         linklist_append(x->refmenu_items, item);
00907         item->flags = 1;        // mark to disable this item (we use it as a label)
00908 
00909         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("/bar"));
00910         linklist_append(x->refmenu_items, item);
00911 
00912 
00913         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("-"));
00914         linklist_append(x->refmenu_items, item);
00915         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("Returns"));
00916         linklist_append(x->refmenu_items, item);
00917         item->flags = 1;        // mark to disable this item (we use it as a label)
00918 
00919         item = (t_symobject *)symobject_new(gensym("/tjottlanddotte"));
00920         linklist_append(x->refmenu_items, item);
00921 }
00922 
00923 
00924 void* ui_oksize(t_ui *x, t_rect *rect)
00925 {
00926         long            unitHeight = 0;
00927         long            unitWidth = 0;
00928         double          unitFrac= 0.0;
00929         t_object        *textfield = NULL;
00930                 
00931         unitHeight = rect->height / JAMOMA_UNIT_HEIGHT;
00932         unitFrac = rect->height - (unitHeight * JAMOMA_UNIT_HEIGHT);
00933         if(unitFrac > (JAMOMA_UNIT_HEIGHT/2))
00934                 unitHeight += 1;        
00935         if(unitHeight < 1)
00936                 unitHeight = 1;
00937         rect->height = unitHeight * JAMOMA_UNIT_HEIGHT;
00938 
00939         unitWidth = rect->width / JAMOMA_UNIT_WIDTH;
00940         unitFrac = rect->width - (unitWidth * JAMOMA_UNIT_WIDTH);
00941         if(unitFrac > (JAMOMA_UNIT_WIDTH/2))
00942                 unitWidth += 1;
00943         if(unitWidth < 1)
00944                 unitWidth = 1;
00945         rect->width = unitWidth * JAMOMA_UNIT_WIDTH;
00946 
00947         // We do textfield configuration here because the margins are dependent upon the dimensions
00948         textfield = jbox_get_textfield((t_object*) x); 
00949         textfield_set_noactivate(textfield, 1);
00950         textfield_set_readonly(textfield, 1);
00951         textfield_set_editonclick(textfield, 0);
00952         textfield_set_wordwrap(textfield, 0);
00953         textfield_set_useellipsis(textfield, 1); 
00954         textfield_set_textcolor(textfield, &s_color_text);
00955         textfield_set_textmargins(textfield, 20.0, 2.0, 60.0, rect->height - 19.0);
00956 
00957         return (void *)1;
00958 }
